XI.i.1.B.2.e
.
Reviewing the ALL AWARDS Page for MOD Payments
Follow the steps in the table below when reviewing a record in the ALL AWARDS page.
Step
Action
1
Select the CPD SPOUSE tab.
2
Review the EFFECTIVE box for award information.
Note
:  If the ALL AWARDS page shows two tabs for the same spouse, it is possible that the surviving spouse received two MOD payments for two different Veterans.  Review the records to determine whether the surviving spouse is entitled to any of those MOD payments.
